['safely', 'at the cottage of her lover.<damage type="tear"/>', '<zone eid="c57-0035__main"/> <surface eid="ox-ms_abinger_c57-0035"/> <surface lrx="7230" lry="5034" partof="ox-frankenstein_notebook_b.xml#ox-frankenstein_volume_ii" ulx="0" uly="0" folio="18v" shelfmark="ms. abinger c. 57" base="ox-ms_abinger_c57/ox-ms_abinger_c57-0036.xml" id="ox-ms_abinger_c57-0036" sid="ox-ms_abinger_c57-0036"/> <graphic url="http://shelleygodwinarchive.org/images/ox/ms_abinger_c57/ms_abinger_c57-0036.jp2"/> <zone type="main" sid="c57-0036__main"/> <damage type="tear"/>', '<zone eid="c57-0036__main"/> <surface eid="ox-ms_abinger_c57-0036"/> <surface lrx="5138" lry="7032" partof="#ox-frankenstein_volume_ii" ulx="0" uly="0" folio="19r" shelfmark="ms. abinger c. 57" base="ox-ms_abinger_c57/ox-ms_abinger_c57-0037.xml" id="ox-ms_abinger_c57-0037" sid="ox-ms_abinger_c57-0037"/> <graphic url="http://shelleygodwinarchive.org/images/ox/ms_abinger_c57/ms_abinger_c57-0037.jp2"/> <zone type="main" sid="c57-0037__main"/> <handshift medium="pen" new="#mws"/> <del>having overcome many difficulties succeeded at length in joining her lover in his retreat </del>']
